author: Source: Inside Bay Area
title: CBS refuses to run ads for 'Truth' - Inside Bay Area
text:
CBS refuses to run any commercials for "Truth," the new film about former CNS news anchor Dan Rather and his discredited 2004 story about former President George Bush's military record. Robert Redford plays Rather and Cate Blanchett plays the story's producer Mary Mapes.
 Inside Bay Area.
